localize.text: When rolling a dice, roll X more times and applies the highest value.
When rolling a dice, roll {0} more times and applies the highest value.
When using Combat Page in this Scene, Manikin uses the same Combat Page as a one-sided attack on the target.
Get 'Immobilization' this Scene. When The Puppeteer uses Combat Page in this Scene, this character uses the same Combat Page as a one-sided attack on the target.
Every dice gain maximum roll value +2 and minimum roll value -1. At the end of the Scene, lose 1 stack.
Every dice gain minimum roll value +2 and maximum roll value -1. At the end of the Scene, lose 1 stack.
